44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: A'isha reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) at the time of breathing his last was reclining against her chest and she was leaning over him and listening to him as he was saying:O Allah, grant me pardon, show mercy to me, enjoin me to companions (on High)

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ عَائِشَةَ رضى الله تعالى عنها
chapter.eng-name: The Virtues Of 'Aishah, The Mother Of The Believers (RA)
